articles.title: B.C. poet illuminates pages of popular scientific magazine with verses about the nature of light - CBC.ca
articles.description: Donna Kane's musings about starlight in the sky above Rolla, B.C., inspired her to write a poem weaving together science and imagery. Her poem has now been published in Scientific American, which has millions of readers.
